Row.Text: Quadrireme [ICON_Range] Range +1.[NEWLINE]Builds Encampment and Industrial Zone district in half the time.[NEWLINE]The support unit can obtain 1 unit free of charge when acquiring the technology necessary for production.

All unit gains +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength when defending.[NEWLINE]All naval units (without aiircraft carrier) can pillage buildings and improvements and capture civilian units on coastal lands.[NEWLINE]All units gain ocean navigation capability as they can get on board.

A district unique to Abyssal Fleets for naval activity in your city. Replaces the Harbor district and cheaper to build. Also removes the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking to and from this tile. Must be built on Coast or Lake Terrain adjacent to land.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval units built in Dockyard[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold when built on a foreign continent[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.[NEWLINE]This District have hitpoints and generate ZOC.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science from adjecent Campus. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjecent Theater.

A district unique to Abyssal Fleets for naval activity in your city. Replaces the Harbor district and cheaper to build. Also removes the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking to and from this tile. Must be built on Coast or Lake Terrain adjacent to land.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval units built in Dockyard[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +4 Loyalty per turn when built on a foreign continent. Cannot be built on Reef.[NEWLINE]This District have hitpoints and generate ZOC.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science from adjecent Campus. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture from adjecent Theater.
Abyssal Fleets unique district: Coastal Fort
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Drillship, unique to Abyssal Fleets.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +2 [ICON_Production] Production. Can be built on Coasts and Oceans.
Harbour Princess unique unit that replaces the Ironcrad. Stronger than Ironcrad. +5 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points for killing units.
Harbour Princess unique unit: Abyssal Armored Cruiser
I told you... not to come... any... closer...
